name: Les Sons Imaginaires
description:
Les Sons Imaginaires
[game made for a Game Jam themed "Small World"]

This world shrunk many years ago, leading to an unexpected consequence:  all of  the world's sound disappeared somehow. It is now up to you to restore all sound to this small world.

Les Sons Imaginaires is a sound-oriented puzzle where you are supposed to restore the sound/music of this really small island. 

TEAM:

Programming / Unity:   Josh Gunn - gunner2.itch.io/

Environment artist, UI graphics:  Nielisson Mendonça - nielisson.eu/

Music:  Gerry Brazell (Dobi) - soundcloud.com/gerry-brazell

Character design: Winter

Sound Designer: Scowsh - https://soundcloud.com/scowsh

Graphics (generalist): Thomson P-T - https://www.behance.net/mythrilmanc780
